title: Championship Riven
body:
For all the whiners out there, there is now a way to get that skin you covet so much.

Just correctly tip every position each team will finish at WORLDS as well as the result of every play-off match. Simple.

http://pickem.oce.lolesports.com/en-AU#welcome

replies.body: I will run naked through Riot HQ if CLG win.
